amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress regarding climate change.

vote.text: Amendment SA 87, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 11.

action.text: Amendment SA 87 proposed by Senator Hoeven to Amendment SA 2.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 87, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 11.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 87, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 11.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 87 proposed by Senator Hoeven to Amendment SA 2.
